issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Android: Properties test case generates a runtime error

comments.body:
{html}

(from [da2628206c037988b45a9f2bfe11c51f97a9329f]) get default values of boxed types, be more specific in the app properties DefaultValues impl [#2082 state:fixed-in-qa] http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/da2628206c037...

{html}

{html}

G2 2.2 mobile sdk 1.5.0.2c1cae. some tests are failing, will log a new bug for them (will wait for thursdays build first)

{html}
